original_title: 42nd Street Pete Presents: 1970s: Extreme Sleaze Showcase: 8mm Madness Series Part V
overview: Back in the sick, sick seventies, anything went as far as kinky sex was concerned. There was a built-in audience of misanthropic viewers who reveled in the degradation of women. Other viewers were the morbidly curious or those into the B&D/S&M scene that was so prevalent back in the day.
title: 42nd Street Pete Presents: 1970s: Extreme Sleaze Showcase: 8mm Madness Series Part V
